bibl.title: Arabs, Arabias, and Arabic Before Late Antiquity.
bibl.note: I. Arabs in Antiquity. - II. From ""land of the Arabs"" to ""people of Arabia"". - III. A complex of language and culture? - IV. What did the ancient Arabs speak? - V. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: M.C.A. Macdonald, Arabs, Arabias, and Arabic Before Late Antiquity.
